name: drawing

params.description: Specify if Drawing control should be collapsed at startup. Default is true.
params.name: options.collapsed

params.description: Openlayers layer that will hosts created features. If none, an empty vector layer will be created.
params.name: options.layer

params.description: Specify if popup is displayed when create a drawing
params.name: options.popup.display

params.description: Function to display popup informations if you want to cutomise it. You may also provide your own function with params : {geomType / feature / saveFunc(message) / closeFunc()}. This function must return the DOM object of the popup content.
params.name: options.popup.function

params.description: Layer informations to be displayed in LayerSwitcher widget (only if a LayerSwitcher is also added to the map)
params.name: options.layerDescription

params.description: Layer title to be displayed in LayerSwitcher
params.name: options.layerDescription.title

params.description: Layer description to be displayed in LayerSwitcher
params.name: options.layerDescription.description

params.description: Tools to display in the drawing toolbox. All by default.
params.name: options.tools

params.description: Display polygons with holes drawing tool
params.name: options.tools.holes

params.description: Display measure drawing into popup info
params.name: options.tools.measure

params.description: Label for polygons with holes drawing tool
params.name: options.labels.holes

params.description: Label for apply to object button.
params.name: options.labels.applyToObject

params.description: Label for set as default style button.
params.name: options.labels.setAsDefault

params.description: List of markers src to be used for points with their anchor offsets See {@link http://openlayers.org/en/latest/apidoc/ol.style.Icon.html OpenLayers params} for anchor offset options.
params.name: options.markersList

params.description: Default styles applying to geometries (labels, lines and polygons).
params.name: options.defaultStyles

params.description: Text fill color for labels (RGB hex value).
params.name: options.defaultStyles.textFillColor

params.description: Text surrounding color for labels (RGB hex value).
params.name: options.defaultStyles.textStrokeColor

params.description: Stroke color (RGB hex value) for polygons.
params.name: options.defaultStyles.polyStrokeColor

params.description: Stroke width in pixels for polygons.
params.name: options.defaultStyles.polyStrokeWidth

params.description: Polygon fill opacity (alpha value between 0:transparent and 1:opaque).
params.name: options.defaultStyles.polyFillOpacity

params.description: cursor (circle) style when drawing or editing.
params.name: options.cursorStyle
